description.narrative: This activity (FLD Learning & Development) is a component of PFA Project for P0233 (Zambia PFA) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Front Line Delivery' and a budget of £163,000. This component benefits Zambia, and works in the following sector(s): Administrative costs (non-sector allocable). , with the following implementing partners: Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)
